name: Repo Men (Prototype)
description:
In the year 2078, organized crime has expanded into the the afterlife and many organizations have created 'Repossession Divisions' which allow them to reclaim property undetected by the authorities. You used to be one of many 'Repo Men'.

But wanting to leave that life, you've dedicated your afterlife to thwarting these activities by possessing living foot soldiers and limiting the sphere of influence of these ghost crime families.

Fight your way through the stage! If you weaken an enemy enough, you can possess their body and any special abilities they have! But be careful, if you die while possessing a living soldier, your ghost will cease to exist. After all, you've already died and shouldn't be back on Earth at all...
